entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:55 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 11:42 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: WSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
